title: TenderConfig
description: Set of available settings for tender

Config.title: Config
Config.description: Set of available settings for tender

doReconcileAmount.description: Indicates whether reconciliation of amount is required

doReconcileQuantity.description: Indicates whether reconciliation of quantity is required

isCashChanger.description: Indicates the cash is handled by a cash changer

maxAllowedAmount.description: Maximum allowed amount in cash drawer, if exceeded, a warning will be triggered.

minAllowedAmount.description: Minimum allowed amount in cash drawer, if below, a warning will be triggered.

maxAllowedDeviationQuantity.description: The maximum allowed deviation for quantity, for a single reconciliation.

maxAllowedDeviationAmount.description: The maximum allowed deviation for amount, for a single reconciliation.

maxAllowedStoreDeviationQuantity.description: The maximum allowed deviation for quantity, for the business unit (includes all reconciliations)

maxAllowedStoreDeviationAmount.description: The maximum allowed deviation for amount, for the business unit (includes all reconciliations).

defaultInitialBalance.description: The value that will be used by default for the initial balance
